testcase.classname: Adding a Finding Category via API
testcase.name: API_US31_TC01_ValidAuth_SuccessStatus_RecordCreationValidation
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/addFindingCategory" path parameters................passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing "Abdominal Diseases" and "2024-04-12 02:19:41" information to send to the api FindingCategory endpoint..passed * The api user sends a POST request body and saves the returned response....passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..passed
